description: Numbers n such that string 1,3 occurs in the base 4 representation of n but not of n+1.
links: Harvey P. Dale, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
mathematica: Transpose[SequencePosition[Table[If[SequenceCount[IntegerDigits[n,4],{1,3}]>0,1,0],{n,700}],{1,0}]][[1]] (* The program uses the SequencePosition and SequenceCount functions from Mathematica version 10 *) (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Apr 19 2015 *)
author: _Clark Kimberling_
